name: Synthwave Buster
description:
Prototype game made for submission to the Tenjin game jam for the theme "Back to the 80s". All assets used are my own. Solo game dev.

Monsters from the game "Ghouls and Gremlins" have escaped from their arcade machine.

Speed, jump and shoot your way to defeating them and save your town.

Objective: Clear out monsters from all areas to complete the game. How fast can you defeat them all?

Controls:

  • WASD - Move
  • Spacebar - Jump/Wall Jump
  • Shift - Dash
  • Left Click - Shoot/Swing
  • Right Click - Aim
  • Q/E - Swap weapons
  • R - Reload
  • Esc - Pause

Contains:

  • 3 Different Synthwave Themed Weapons: Baseball bat, Shotgun, Rocket Launcher
  • Power ups
  • Wall Jumping
  • Platforming
  • Fast paced action
